title: [Snowy Plains, Deep Freeze]
description: You heave a thankful sigh of relief as the snowfall all but stops and a few rays of sun find their way through the dense cloud cover.  Although it brings no warmth, the sunlight brightens your mood and with new resolve, you forge ahead.

You heave a thankful sigh of relief as the snowfall all but stops and a few rays of moonlight find their way through the dense cloud cover.  Although it brings no warmth, the moonlight brightens your mood and with new resolve, you forge ahead.
